amendatorysection.catchline: Property of State Energy Office; transfer to Department of Environment and Energy.
amendatorysection.para: On July 1, 2019, all items of property, real and personal, including office furniture and fixtures, books, documents, and records of the State Energy Office pertaining to the duties and functions transferred to the Department of Environment and Energy pursuant to Laws 2019, LB302, shall become the property of such department.
